about_the_game:
A chip-based deckbuilder with plenty of tweaks to cheat your way to victory. Link up upgrades, install modification tubes, and alter the scoring to discover your perfect strategy. Can you outwit the Rabanaz machine?

- Synergize your gambling strategy: Select and create new chips for your collection. Install vaccuum tubes that alter how the machine works. Discover the best combinations to maximize your chances.

- Every run is unique: The machine doesn't want you to win and will alter its circuits, change the tubes available, and throw different obstacles in your path. Can you uncover what's at the heart of this?

- Shiny and permanent: Randomness need not be so random. Each run earns you a precious few gems that be spent to tilt your future odds more in your favour.

Screenshots are tentative, as we aren't quite done in the graphics category yet. Expect more, not less.

Things coming:

  • Controller: We love controllers and would play all games with them if we could. So full controller support is desired.

  • Early Access: When the game's full gameplay and end-to-end playthrough is done we'll do early access to help us with balancing and release details.

  • Challenge Modes: Within a sea of randomness, can be islands of well contained randomness to challenge you further

  • More and more tubes and boss tubes

  • A story, though not a detailed one, perhaps a few static cutscenes and mysterious text

  • More visuals. No promises here, but we want to spend a fair amount of time on aesthetic flash while balancing the game.

- Synergize your gambling strategy: Select and create new chips for your collection. Install vaccuum tubes that alter how the machine works. Discover the best combinations to maximize your chances.

- Every run is unique: The machine doesn't want you to win and will alter its circuits, change the tubes available, and throw different obstacles in your path. Can you uncover what's at the heart of this?

- Shiny and permanent: Randomness need not be so random. Each run earns you a precious few gems that be spent to tilt your future odds more in your favour.

Screenshots are tentative, as we aren't quite done in the graphics category yet. Expect more, not less.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Rabanaz

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 or Vulkan capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
